data.text:
From sanjay dutt to kishore kumar and neelima Azeem, celebs who did more than 2 marriages

Here we are going to tell you about those stars who have done 3 or more marriages in their life. These include names ranging from sanjay dutt to karan Singh Grover.

The lives of bollywood stars have always been a topic of discussion. Be it their luxury lifestyle or affairs, fans always try to know more and more about their favorite celebs. In such a situation, there is a different craze for the marriages of bollywood celebs. However, just like the marriages of celebs bring happiness to their fans, the news of their breakups and divorces leaves fans heartbroken.

Separation seems to be the easiest way to deal with deteriorating relationships. There are many such stars in bollywood too, whose first marriage was not successful and they chose the option of second marriage. Many have done 3 or 4 marriages as well. So without any delay let us tell you about those stars who have done 3 or more marriages.

1. kishore Kumar

The first name in this list comes from the famous singer and actor of hindi cinema, kishore kumar, who had not one or two, but 4 marriages in his life.

Kishore Kumar's first wife

The singer who charmed the world with his magical voice, first married bengali singer-actress Ruma Guha Thakurta in 1950, the niece of bollywood veteran director Satyajit Ray. Two years later, the couple welcomed their son amit Kumar, who is a singer like his father. However, after 8 years of marriage, the couple parted ways due to their deteriorating relationship.

Kishore Kumar's second wife

After separating from Ruma, kishore kumar found love in Bollywood's most beautiful and legendary actress Madhubala. kishore converted to islam to marry Madhu (1960) and changed his name to Karim Abdul. However, this marriage also did not last long, as madhubala died in 1969 at the age of just 36 due to a hole in the heart.

Kishore Kumar's third wife

After the departure of madhubala, kishore kumar struggled with emptiness for a long time, which was fulfilled by the then-rising actress Yogita Bali. kishore married Yogita in 1976. However, kishore and Yogita's marriage also did not last long and the couple separated in 1978 after just 2 years.

Kishore Kumar's fourth wife

Even after three unsuccessful marriages, kishore believed in marriage, that's why he married for the fourth time in 1980 with Leena Chandavarkar, the most sought-after actress of her time. The couple welcomed their son sumit Kumar in 1984. Leena stayed with kishore till his last days.

2. mithun Chakraborty

Bollywood's 'Disco Dancer' mithun chakraborty has created a special identity in the hearts of the audience with his dance moves as well as acting and unique dialogue delivery. The actor has done two marriages in his life. He married model-turned-actress Helena Luke in 1979 after a breakup with actress Sarika. However, the couple parted ways after 5 months.

Soon after, mithun married his ex-girlfriend Yogita Bali in 1979. This was also the time when Yogita separated from her husband kishore Kumar. Also, mithun had separated from his wife Helena. In such a situation, both were struggling with the pain of their broken marriage and soon both became sympathizers of each other. The couple has three sons, Mahaakshay Chakraborty, Ushme Chakraborty, and Namashi Chakraborty. At the same time, he has adopted a daughter Dishani Chakraborty.

However, Yogita and Mithun's marriage started turning sour when reports of the actor's growing closeness with sridevi surfaced. The matter became serious after the secret wedding of sridevi and mithun in the year 1985, but when Yogita threatened the actor with suicide, the marriage of sridevi and mithun was forced to break in 1988.

3. Kamal Haasan

Kamal Haasan, the megastar of the South Film Industry, has done three marriages. Kamal first married classical dancer vani Ganapathy in 1978 at the age of 24. However, the couple got divorced after ten years in 1988. Months after the divorce, Kamal was reportedly in a live-in relationship with his co-actress and girlfriend Sarika. The two married after shruti haasan was born and then welcomed their second daughter, Akshara, in 1991. However, the two parted ways in 2004.

After this, actress Gautami Tadimalla entered Kamal Haasan's life, with whom he started dating in 2005. It is said that both of them had a secret wedding with each other, but unfortunately, they got divorced in 2016.

4. karan Singh Grover

Lakhs of girls were infatuated with TV's handsome hunk karan Singh Grover. He is best known for his role as 'Dr. Armaan' in 'Dill Mill Gayye'. The actor has made three marriages in his life. Karan's first marriage took place in 2008 with tv actress Shraddha Nigam. However, within 10 months of marriage, the two separate

Thereafter, karan married his Dill Mill Gayye co-star Jennifer Winget in 2012. The pair of both looked like 'Made-in Heaven'. Both were one of the most loved couples on TV. However, they got divorced in 2014, much to the shock of their fans.
